mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( c_id, pd_name, pd_price, pd_description, pd_quantity, pd_wholesale, pd_dcrate, pd_created_at, pd_is_maintain, pd_retention_period) VALUES ( #{cId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{quantity}, #{wholesale}, #{dcRate}, #{createDate}, 0, null )
insert into PRODUCT_IMG (pd_id, pi_no, pi_img) values(#{pId}, #{no}, #{img})
mapper.select: select pd_id from PRODUCT order by 1 desc LIMIT 0, 1

select pd_id pId, c_id cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0

select pd_id as pId, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0 LIMIT #{start}, #{pageNum}

select pd_id as pId, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0 where pd_id = #{pd_id}
select count(*) from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0

select pd_id as pId, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where DATEDIFF(now(), pd_created_at) < 61 and pd_is_maintain = 0 ORDER BY createDate desc LIMIT #{start}, #{pageNum}
select count(*) from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where DATEDIFF(now(), pd_created_at) < 61 and pd_is_maintain = 0

select pd_id as pId, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where c_id = #{C_ID} and pd_is_maintain = 0 ORDER BY pd_id LIMIT #{start}, #{pageNum}
select count(*) from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where c_id = #{C_ID} and pd_is_maintain = 0
select pd_id as pId, pi_no no, pi_img img from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT_IMG where pd_id = #{pd_id} and pi_no = 0
select count(*) from ORDERS where pd_id = #{pd_id}

select pd_id as pId, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as description, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesale as wholesale, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_created_at as createDate, pd_is_maintain as isMaintain, pd_retention_period as retetionDate from PRODUCT where pd_id in ( select pd_id from ( SELECT pd_id, COUNT(*) as hit FROM ORDERS WHERE pd_id IN (SELECT pd_id FROM PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0) GROUP BY pd_id ORDER BY hit desc LIMIT #{start}, #{pageNum} ) as pop )
select pd_id from ( SELECT pd_id, COUNT(*) as hit FROM ORDERS WHERE pd_id IN (SELECT pd_id FROM PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0) GROUP BY pd_id ORDER BY hit desc LIMIT 36 ) as pop
select count(*) from ( SELECT COUNT(*) as hit FROM ORDERS WHERE pd_id IN (SELECT pd_id FROM PRODUCT where pd_is_maintain = 0) GROUP BY pd_id ) as pop
